00143         // cloak generators
00144         bool CloakGen_InclHouse(unsigned int idx)
00145                 { return ((1 << idx) & this->CloakedByHouses) != 0; }
00146 
00147         void CloakGen_AddHouse(unsigned int idx)
00148                 { this->CloakedByHouses |= 1 << idx; }
00149 
00150         void CloakGen_RemHouse(unsigned int idx)
00151                 { this->CloakedByHouses &= ~(1 << idx); }

00226         // HACK EVIL HACK
00227         static int BridgeHeight()
00228         { return *(int *)0xB0C07C; }
00229 
00230         static CoordStruct * Cell2Coord(CellStruct* cell, CoordStruct *crd)
00231         {
00232                 crd->X = cell->X * 256 + 128;
00233                 crd->Y = cell->Y * 256 + 128;
00234                 crd->Z = 0;
00235                 return crd;
00236         }
00237 
00238         static CellStruct * Coord2Cell(CoordStruct *crd, CellStruct* cell)
00239         {
00240                 cell->X = short(crd->X / 256);
00241                 cell->Y = short(crd->Y / 256);
00242                 return cell;
00243         }
00244 
00245         CoordStruct * FixHeight(CoordStruct *crd)
00246         {
00247                 crd->Z += ((this->Flags & cf_Bridge) != 0) * BridgeHeight();
00248                 return crd;
00249         }
